title: Best Ever Chicken Soup
ingredients: ['1 (0.9 to 1.35kg) whole chicken', '3 sticks celery with leaves, chopped', '450g baby carrots', '2 onions, chopped', '2 cubes beef stock, crumbled', '1 packet chicken noodle soup mix', '825ml low salt chicken stock', '1 pinch dried thyme', '1 pinch chicken seasoning', '1 pinch dried basil', '5 black peppercorns', '2 bay leaves', '1 pinch dried parsley', '225g farfalle (bow tie) pasta']
